attributes.action: I oppose the closure of Rectory Field Residential Care Home.
attributes.additional_details:
Sent from my iPhone

Please help save our care homes, sign to support our older vulnerable residents of northern ireland, a service needed by everyone.
Rectory Field provides respite for older people discharged from hospital in need tlc an rehab. With the aim of returning to their own home with a care package. Rectory Field is also home permanent residents who live there as they can't live  independently without  a bit of help. The home provides vital residential care for up to 35 people please help us save their home.
